Module dunbar.c195pa
Package dunbar.c195pa.Controller

Class CustomerAppointmentsWindowController

java.lang.Object
dunbar.c195pa.Controller.CustomerAppointmentsWindowController
public class CustomerAppointmentsWindowController extends Object
The CustomerAppointmentsWindowController controls the interface used to display all appointments for a particular customer, as selected in the CustomerInfoWindow. Allows adding, updating, and deleting of appointments for the specific customer without needing to return to the main appointments window.

  • Method Details

    • closeWindow

      void closeWindow(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Closes the customer appointments window when the close button is pressed.

    • deleteAppointment

      void deleteAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      Deletes the selected appointment when the delete button is pressed. If the delete button is pressed with no appointment selected, displays an error. Refreshes the table to reflect the updated results after the appointment is deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • toAddAppointmentWindow

      void toAddAppointmentWindow(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Opens the Add Appointment window when the add button is pressed, prepopulating the Customer_ID field with the current customer ID.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • toUpdateAppointmentWindow

      void toUpdateAppointmentWindow(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Opens the Update Appointment window for the selected appointment when the update button is pressed.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • loadCustomerAppointments

      public void loadCustomerAppointments(Customer selectedCustomer) throws SQLException
      Loads all appointments for the customer selected in the Customer Info Window into the customerAppointments table.
      Parameters:
      selectedCustomer - Customer selected in the previous window
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • refreshTable

      public void refreshTable() throws SQLException
      Refreshes the customerAppointments table with updated values from the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException
